packagegui.title: Reverse Proxy Server: Mappings

field.description: If checked, then this URI (Uniform Resource Name) will be available for reverse proxy config.
Name to identify this URI on Squid reverse proxy configuration. Example: URI1
Apply these group mappings to the selected peers. Use CTRL + click to select multiple peers.

Use URI row(s) below to add URL regex expression(s) to match (one per row).
Examples:
.mydomain.com
.mydomain.com/test
www.mydomain.com
http://www.mydomain.com/
^http://www.mydomain.com/.*$

rowhelperfield.fielddescr: Enter URL regex to match. Click Info above for examples.
